tweet_text: @Spencimus The only wrinkle is that some writers get so big they get shoved into the "well, it's sci fi, but it's RESPECTABLE" pile over the course of their careers. That definitely happened with Gibson and Le Guin, but it was a long process.
text_en: The only wrinkle is that some writers get so big they get shoved into the "well, it's sci fi, but it's RESPECTABLE" pile over the course of their careers. That definitely happened with Gibson and Le Guin, but it was a long process.
